mapper.insert: insert into sample_users (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_phone) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update sample_users set user_password = #{password}, user_email = #{email}, user_phone = #{phone}, user_status = #{status}, user_point = #{point} where user_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select user_id as id, user_name as name, user_password as password, user_email as email, user_phone as phone, user_status as status, user_point as point, user_created_date as createdDate from sample_users where user_id = #{value}
